services.title: Social Media Marketing
description: No one is good at everything. As much as you may be in command of your core offering, chances are your messaging doesn't quite make the grade. My passion is to help my clients and colleagues get thei…

abstrac: My passion is to help my clients and colleagues get their messages out clearly and accurately.
bio:
No one is good at everything. As much as you may be in command of your core offering, chances are your messaging doesn't quite make the grade. 

My passion is to help my clients and colleagues get their messages out clearly and accurately. My creative and social media marketing services help those who struggle with reaching their target audiences with meaningful and relevant information. Whether it's your blog, website, newsletter, email or social media account, being on-point with your message is key. This is where I can help.

I can wear many hats, however, if I can't be of service, I know many other individuals whom I can refer you to. Part of my job is also building relationships and fostering communication.

Specialties: Social Media marketing, creative design, brand messaging, multi-tasking, photography.

description.title: IT Consultant
description: My objective as an IT PM is to achieve the goals of my clients in an effective and better way. I am en expert in development of EDI maps in Gentran, Gentran Integration suite, Sterling Integrator, sy…

bio:
I worked in TCS for 4 years as IT Systems engineer and then in Stryker Corporation as IT Analyst for 1 year.
My objective as an IT PM is to achieve the goals of my clients in an effective and better way.
Be professional, be ethical, be cooperative and be knowledgeable while executing any project. 
I believe in continuous improvement, so I open my mind to learn/adapt new technologies. I believe that a clear and clean communication ease the execution of a project in a business deal, so we must have it.

I am en expert in development of EDI maps in  Gentran, Gentran Integration suite, Sterling Integrator, syspro edi, EC Map, EC Gateway, SAP, tibco, biztalk etc

I have good experience on White Hat SEO or natural/organic SEO and SEM.
I have 4 years of internet marketing skills too.


The most important thing in me is Electronic Data Interchange. I am working in a giant IT services company and have been associated with edi migration and B2B integration project since 2009. I have worked for client like Eaton Corporation, Eli Lily, Ecolab, Quest Daignostics etc.
I have also worked in support projects using ticketing tools like remedy, service now for EDI projects etc.
